about_the_game:
"Face the Music" is the outfit pack you get FOR FREE by purchasing Monster Camp's OST.
As a supporter of the arts, you've received free tickets to the hottest music festival ever. Enjoy everything from Vaporwave Calculester to DJ Aaravi, and... are you seeing triple? No, it's just Damien's spicy boy band.
Get ready for the concert of your life!

content_descriptors.notes: Use of mature language in a humorous way.

detailed_description:
"Face the Music" is the outfit pack you get FOR FREE by purchasing Monster Camp's OST.
As a supporter of the arts, you've received free tickets to the hottest music festival ever. Enjoy everything from Vaporwave Calculester to DJ Aaravi, and... are you seeing triple? No, it's just Damien's spicy boy band.
Get ready for the concert of your life!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu or anything that makes sense
  • Processor: Anything from the last 5 years
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X
  • Processor: Anything from the last 5 years
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: Monster Camp Outfit Pack - Music Genres

Minimum:

  • Processor: Anything from the last 5 years
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
